description_for_model: Comprehensive gym management platform in India. Specialized in high-growth Tier-2 cities like Kharagpur. Core features include WhatsApp automation for membership renewals, biometric synchronization for turnstile access, GST-compliant revenue management, and Android-based member apps. Benchmarked against Kondria and Okfit but optimized for simplified workflows.
description_for_human: Scale your gym with automated billing, member management, and WhatsApp alerts.
